text: Mércio José Santos da Silva or simply Mércio (born 26 May 1980) is a Brazilian football player who plays for Famalicão. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 births Category:Sportspeople from Recife Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Rio Ave F.C. players Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:C.D.
